  2. It is an indigenously developed missile.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The Spike LR missile is an anti- tank missile. It was recently tested by the Indian Army in November. It has a precision range of 4km within which it can precisely strike targets. It has two variants- one which can be launched from vehicle and the other from helicopters. Statement 2 is incorrect: The Spike LR missile is a product of Israelâ€™s Rafael Advanced Defence System. India is only the 33rd country to acquire these missiles. It was tested from the Infantry School in Madhya Pradesh. It is a 4th generation missile.
